mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_NO, EMAIL, NAME, NICNM, PW, ZIPCD, ADDRS, DTL_ADDRS, MEMBER_TYPE, SOCIAL_TYPE) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email},#{name},#{nicnm},#{pw},#{zipcd},#{addrs},#{dtl_addrs},#{member_type},#{social_type})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARKET_MEMBER WHERE REGNUM = #{regnum}

SELECT COUNT1,COUNT2 FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT1 FROM MARKET_MEMBER WHERE BRANCH_NAME IS NULL AND MARKET_NO = #{market_no}) A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT2 FROM MARKET_MEMBER WHERE BRANCH_NAME IS NOT NULL AND MARKET_NO = #{market_no}) B
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MARKET_MEMBER WHERE MARKET_NO = #{market_no} AND BRANCH_NAME = #{branch_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, EMAIL, NAME,PW, ZIPCD, ADDRS, DTL_ADDRS,MEMBER_TYPE) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email},#{name},#{pw},#{zipcd},#{addrs},#{dtl_addrs},2) INTO MARKET_MEMBER (MARKET_MEMBER_NO, MARKET_NO, REGNUM, PHONE_NUM, START_TIME, END_TIME, BRANCH_NAME) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{market_no},#{regnum},#{phone_num},#{start_time},#{end_time},#{branch_name}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
